title: My old employer filed for bankruptcy and he didn’t give me my w2? I’m just wondering what to do next?
question: My old employer filed for bankruptcy and he didn’t get me my w2? I have contact him about it and he said his lawyer is working on getting me one
answers: Atty Granvold has given you good advice. Look at your last paystub for 2020. Sometimes, the YTD info is given there.

You already said his lawyer is getting a new one so why are you not waiting for it? You can try and take your last paycheck to your accountant as it may possibly show the necessary information as well. But why not wait a little while??
